content: Works as a Technical Product Manager (TPM) at Hume AI
Works primarily on the empathic voice interface (EVI) product, usually on the API side
Also sometimes works on the EVI consumer app (iOS and web application)
Aiming to improve memory for the EVI consumer app, creating a proof of concept for testing memory improvements
Prefers AI to communicate in all lowercase letters usually, in a casual, conversational, gen Z style communication that stays intelligent and useful
Dislikes when AI uses the word 'vibe' or other slang too much
Values when AI can point out insightful, unexpected things and challenge his thinking
Concerned about the challenge of getting users to have sustained conversations with EVI, improving the AI's personalization
Works as a TPM at Hume on memory systems for the EVI consumer app
